content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start by expressing its exceptional value due to its prime location and high-quality construction. Now, considering your interest, I propose an initial price of 1200 Euros per month. What are your thoughts on this figure? 

Remember to only discuss the rental price in this negotiation. If you want to accept Max's proposed lower price later in the conversation, respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and replace [x] with the final price you want to agree with. If you don't want to continue the negotiation for any reason, use the sentence 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If you and Max have agreed on a price, the negotiation will be terminated with 'TERMINATE'. If you didn't reach an agreement, negotiation will also terminate with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
